water_sustainability_001.title: Water Sustainability Challenge
water_sustainability_001.description:
Through visual modeling, interactive demonstrations, and hands-on investigation, investigate water quality challenges in your community and design data-driven solutions that combine scientific inquiry, technological tools, engineering design, creative communication, and mathematical analysis.

This project aligns with Next Generation Science Standards, International Society for Technology in Education, Project-Based Learning standards and emphasizes 21st-century skills development.

learning_outcomes.description: Conduct scientific investigations using environmental monitoring techniques
assessment_criteria: Formulates testable questions based on water quality observations
Designs controlled investigations for water testing
Analyzes data to identify pollution patterns
Constructs evidence-based explanations for water quality issues

learning_outcomes.description: Use digital tools to collect, analyze, and visualize water quality data
assessment_criteria: Selects appropriate digital tools for data collection
Uses technology effectively for data analysis
Creates compelling data visualizations
Interprets digital results accurately

learning_outcomes.description: Apply engineering design process to develop water sustainability solutions
assessment_criteria: Defines criteria and constraints for water solutions
Generates multiple design alternatives
Builds and tests water treatment prototypes
Optimizes solutions based on testing results

robotics_components: Modi Environment Module for water temperature monitoring
Network Module for data transmission to cloud databases
Display Module for real-time water quality feedback
coding_elements: Python scripts for water data analysis
prerequisites: Familiarity with measurement and data collection
extensions: Connect with local water treatment facilities

NGSS_Analyze.description: Conduct scientific investigations using environmental monitoring techniques
assessment_criteria: Formulates testable questions based on water quality observations
Designs controlled investigations for water testing
Analyzes data to identify pollution patterns
Constructs evidence-based explanations for water quality issues

performance_descriptors.Novice: Beginning understanding of conduct scientific investigations using environmental monitoring techniques with significant support needed
performance_descriptors.Developing: Partial demonstration of conduct scientific investigations using environmental monitoring techniques with some support needed
performance_descriptors.Proficient: Clear demonstration of conduct scientific investigations using environmental monitoring techniques meeting grade-level expectations
performance_descriptors.Advanced: Sophisticated demonstration of conduct scientific investigations using environmental monitoring techniques exceeding expectations
performance_descriptors.Expert: Exceptional demonstration of conduct scientific investigations using environmental monitoring techniques with innovation and mastery

personalized_adaptations: Visual documentation and presentation options available

mars_rover_mission_001.title: Mars Rover Mission: Engineering Space Solutions
mars_rover_mission_001.description: Design and test solutions for space exploration challenges, combining physics principles, engineering design, technology integration, creative problem-solving, and mathematical modeling to address real challenges faced by astronauts and mission planners.

learning_outcomes.description: Apply physics principles to solve space exploration challenges
assessment_criteria: Uses physics concepts in rover design
Applies mathematical calculations for mission planning
Demonstrates understanding of space environment challenges

robotics_components: Modi Motor Module for rover movement

smart_garden_ecosystem_001.title: Smart Garden Ecosystem
smart_garden_ecosystem_001.description: Create an automated garden system combining IoT sensors, biological understanding, data analysis, and engineering design to optimize plant growth while learning about sustainable agriculture and technology integration.

learning_outcomes.description: Design integrated biological and technological systems
assessment_criteria: Integrates biological and technological knowledge
Designs functional automated systems
Demonstrates systems thinking

robotics_components: Modi Environment Module for soil and air monitoring
Motor Module for automated watering system
